events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning wrong item and refund.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this refund case concerning the wrong item received.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Here is my order number 123456 and attached is a photo showing the wrong item I got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately. You should see the amount back on your card within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and solution! I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund case has been resolved successfully. Please contact us again if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and everything is satisfactory with your recent support experience.
We are closing this case now as all concerns related to your refund have been addressed. Thank you for your patience.
